com.emarsys.predict

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emarsys.predict.Transaction

  • public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    The transaction. Please send transaction instances only once.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Transaction()
      Creates a transaction.
      Transaction(RecommendedItem item)
      Creates a transaction, if the user comes from selected(clicked) a recommended item.

      • Transaction

        public Transaction()
        Creates a transaction.

      • Transaction

        public Transaction(RecommendedItem item)
        Creates a transaction, if the user comes from selected(clicked) a recommended item.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • availabilityZone

        public void availabilityZone(java.lang.String availabilityZone)
        Set availability zone. See javascript api reference for more explanation.
        Parameters:
        availabilityZone - ID of the availability zone.

      • purchase

        public void purchase(java.lang.String orderId,
                     java.util.List<CartItem> items)
        Report a purchase event. This command should be called on the order confirmation page to report successful purchases. Also make sure all purchased items are passed to the command.
        Parameters:
        orderId - ID of the purchase.
        items - list of purchased objects.

      • searchTerm

        public void searchTerm(java.lang.String searchTerm)
        Set search terms entered by visitor. This call should be placed in the search results page.
        Parameters:
        searchTerm - search term entered by user.

      • view

        public void view(java.lang.String itemId)
        Report a product browsed by visitor. This command should be placed in all product pages â€“ i.e. pages showing a single item in detail. Recommender features RELATED and ALSO_BOUGHT depend on this call.
        Parameters:
        itemId - ID of the viewed item (consistent with the item column specified in the catalog).

      • cart

        public void cart(java.util.List<CartItem> items)
        Report the list of items in the visitor's shopping cart. This command should be called on every page. Make sure all cart items are passed to the command. If the visitor's cart is empty, send the empty array.
        Parameters:
        items - list of cart objects.

      • category

        public void category(java.lang.String category)
        Report the category currently browsed by visitor. Should be called on all category pages. Pass a valid category path.
        Parameters:
        category - category path.

      • keyword

        public void keyword(java.lang.String keyword)
        Report the keyword used by visitors to refine their searches. Brands, locations, price ranges are good examples of such keywords. If your site offers such features, you can pass keywords to the recommender system with this command.
        Parameters:
        keyword - keyword selected by user.

      • tag

        public void tag(java.lang.String tag)
        Add an arbitrary tag to the current event. The tag is collected and can be accessed later from other Emarsys products.
        Parameters:
        tag - tag selected by user.

      • recommend

        public void recommend(RecommendationRequest request)
        Request recommendations. See usage examples and the list of available recommendation strategies.
        Parameters:
        request - recommendation request instance.

      • recommend

        public void recommend(RecommendationRequest request,
                      CompletionHandler completionHandler)
        Request recommendations. See usage examples and the list of available recommendation strategies.
        Parameters:
        request - recommendation request instance.
        completionHandler - completion handler
